thread.section_title: Medisave US LLP Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Medisave US LLP | www.medisave.net
thread.title: Marcelo Amarante
thread.title_full: Medisave US LLP reviewed by Marcelo Amarante

author: Marcelo Amarante
title: Marcelo Amarante
text: If you are in a rush, simply don't rely on their rush service. They were completely unresponsive with the delivery on time, after I contacted them they said that my card was declined, I called my bank and the bank stated that the order was deducted from my account. Simply unbelievable! Not recommend at all and would avoid any other buying with them!
